import {extend,isArray,startCase} from "lodash";
 
import React from "react";
import {cx} from "emotion";
 
 
import PropTypes from "../utils/prop-types-extra";
import Field from "./field";
 
import getFormStyle from "../styles/form/form.style";
 
 
export function FormBody(props) {
 
  let elementCount = 0;
 
  let body = [];
  const fields = props.fields || [];
  fields.forEach(function(field) {
    if (isArray(field)) {
      body = body.concat(field.map((element)=>{
        Iif (element.key) { return element; }
        elementCount += 1;
        return React.cloneElement(element,{key: (`el${elementCount}`)});
      }));
    }
    else {
      body.push(<Field fluid {...field} />);
    }
  });
 
  return <div>{body}</div>;
 
}
 
FormBody.propTypes = {
  fields: PropTypes.array,
};
 
 
export default class Form extends React.Component {
 
  onChange = (ev,name,value)=>{
    if (this.props.onChange) {
      // for some unknown reason this is getting fired twice, the second time, it gives an undefined value
      // can't see a legitimate reason for having an undefined value so ignore them
      if (value !== undefined) {
        this.props.onChange(ev,name,value,this);
      }
    }
  }
 
  onSubmit = (ev)=>{
    ev.preventDefault();
    if (this.props.onSubmit) {
      this.props.onSubmit(ev);
    }
  }
 
  focus = (fieldName)=>{
    if (this.formElement) {
      this.formElement.querySelector(`[name='${fieldName}']`).focus();
    }
  }
 
  render() {
    
    const {
      data: _data,
      validation: _validation,
      fields: _fields,
 
      formTop,
      formBottom,
      bodyComponent,
      loading,
      inverted,
 
      onChange,
      onSubmit,
 
      className: _className,
      size,
 
      ...otherProps
 
    } = this.props;
 
 
    const form = this;
    const data = extend({},(_data || {}));
 
    const {messages} = _validation || {valid: true,messages: {}};
 
    const fields = _fields.map(function(field) {
      if (isArray(field)) { return field; }
      field = extend({},field);
      if (field.hideLabel === undefined) {
        field.hideLabel = field.label === false;
      }
      field.label = field.label || startCase(field.name);
      if (field.value === undefined) {
        field.value = data[field.name] || "";
      }
      field.validation = field.validation || messages[field.name];
      field.onChange = field.onChange || form.onChange;
 
      Eif (!field.key) { field.key = field.name; }
 
      return field;
    });
 
 
    const bodyProps = {form,fields,data};
 
    const body = React.createElement(bodyComponent,bodyProps);
 
    const styleFlags = {
      loading,
      inverted,
    };
 
    const className = cx("cm-form",getFormStyle(styleFlags,size),_className);
 
    return (
      <form 
        ref={(el)=>{ this.formElement = el; }} 
        {...{
          className,
          onSubmit,
        }}
        {...otherProps}
      >
        {formTop}
        {body}
        {formBottom}
      </form>
    );
 
  }
 
}
 
Form.propTypes = {
  onChange: PropTypes.func,
  onSubmit: PropTypes.func,
  data: PropTypes.object,
  validation: PropTypes.object,
  fields: PropTypes.array,
  bodyComponent: PropTypes.component,
  formTop: PropTypes.node,
  formBottom: PropTypes.node,
};
 
Form.defaultProps = {
  bodyComponent: FormBody
};
